name: react-huge-iconss
description: A Huge Icons icon pack made by Zero-Icon team. Developing ...

scripts.rimraf: rimraf ./react-huge-icons-develop/_svg/bulk/optimized && rimraf ./react-huge-icons-develop/_svg/outline/optimized && rimraf ./react-huge-icons-develop/_svg/solid/optimized && rimraf ./react-huge-icons-develop/_components/bulk && rimraf ./react-huge-icons-develop/_components/outline && rimraf ./react-huge-icons-develop/_components/solid && rimraf ./react-huge-icons/bulk && rimraf ./react-huge-icons/outline && rimraf ./react-huge-icons/solid
scripts.rimraf:types: rimraf ./react-huge-icons/bulk/types && rimraf ./react-huge-icons/bulk/esm/types && rimraf ./react-huge-icons/outline/types && rimraf ./react-huge-icons/outline/esm/types && rimraf ./react-huge-icons/solid/types && rimraf ./react-huge-icons/solid/esm/types
scripts.build: npm run rimraf && npm run outline:mk-cp && npm run solid:mk-cp && npm run bulk:mk-cp && npm run rollup && npm run rimraf:types
scripts.outline:mk-cp: npm run outline:svgo && npm run outline:svgr
scripts.solid:mk-cp: npm run solid:svgo && npm run solid:svgr
scripts.bulk:mk-cp: npm run bulk:svgo && npm run bulk:svgr
